title: Made By Mary
description: What if the one thing you can’t have is the only thing you want?Ann is desperate for the children she can’t have because of a medical condition. Her mother Mary, a 50-year-old self-described pagan, hopes to make amends for her maternal neglect. Together, they plunge into the expensive, morally complex world of reproductive technology and an intimacy neither they, nor Ann’s husband, Joel, is prepared for, forcing them all to confront the potentially calamitous consequences of pursuing their deepest desires.
author: Laura Catherine Brown
